[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@remirror/extension-emoji](./extension-emoji.md) &gt; [EmojiExtensionOptions](./extension-emoji.emojiextensionoptions.md) &gt; [defaultEmoji](./extension-emoji.emojiextensionoptions.defaultemoji.md)

## EmojiExtensionOptions.defaultEmoji property

A list of the initial (frequently used) emoji displayed to the user. These are used when the query typed is less than two characters long.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
defaultEmoji?: NamesAndAliases[];
```
